verification_level.LOW: Members must have a verified email in their Discord account.
verification_level.MEDIUM: Members must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes.
verification_level.HIGH: Members must be members of this server for longer than 10 minutes.
verification_level.VERY_HIGH: Members must have a verified phone in their Discord account.

explicit_content_filter.MEMBERS_WITHOUT_ROLES: Scanning media from members without roles.
explicit_content_filter.ALL_MEMBERS: Scanning media from all the members.
